entry.def: Interdependence is the condition of a group of people or things that all depend on each other.

means.word_mean: 1. a reciprocal relation between interdependent entities (objects or individuals or groups)

Sentence.sentence: Evidence of interdependence is everywhere; we are on this journey together.
